# Type

Mono Fonts

Kong is a Lua application running in Nginx

Kong is a Lua application running in Nginx

Kong is a Lua application running in Nginx

Kong is a Lua application running in Nginx

Kong is a Lua application running in Nginx

Kong is a Lua application running in Nginx

Kong is a Lua application running in Nginx

Kong is a Lua application running in Nginx

# Utilites

Class Description Properties
.truncate Truncates text with "..." 
{ 
white-space: nowrap; 
text-overflow: ellipsis; 
overflow: hidden;
}
.cursor-pointer Sets cursor type 
{ cursor: pointer; }
.d-none Sets display to none 
{ display: flex; }
.overflow-hidden Sets overflow 
{ overflow: hidden; }
.w-100 Sets element to 100% width 
{ width: 100%; }
